channel.title: Comments on: Shameless plug
channel.description: I am multiple and various - Tomas A. Krag

item.title: By: Peter
item.dc:creator: Peter
item.description: Tomas I am going have to learn danish if I want to keep reading your web log. All I know for now is "det var som fanden" which, although probably useful in a number of situations, somewhat limits me. I don't know, can I even say that in a web log?
item.content:encoded:
Tomas I am going have to learn danish if I want to keep reading your web log. All I know for now is
“det var som fanden” which, although probably useful in a number of situations, somewhat limits me. I don’t know, can I even say that in a web log?

item.title: By: m u l · t i · p l i c · i · t y
item.dc:creator: m u l · t i · p l i c · i · t y
item.description:
<strong>Shameless plug - follow-up</strong>
After a number of requests (well actually two), I've thrown together a quick translation of the article on Ghana Telecom in which I am heavily quoted. I posted this shameless plug yesterday. And got these comments: Tomas I am going have to learn danish...
item.content:encoded:
Shameless plug – follow-up

After a number of requests (well actually two), I’ve thrown together a quick translation of the article on Ghana Telecom in which I am heavily quoted. I posted this shameless plug yesterday. And got these comments: Tomas I am going have to learn danish…
